Miscellaneous Highlights: The Copa América final will be held at the Hard Rock Stadium in Miami on July 14th.
Tickets for the match are available starting at $1,500 and going up to $9,000 on Ticketmaster, SeatGeek, and StubHub.
Shakira will perform at the closing ceremony of the Copa América final.
The tournament will be broadcast on FOX Networks, Univision, and TUDN.
